text:
@MattHancock Really?

That was supposed to happen at Covid-19 level 1. Scientists and doctors say we're at level 4 and that this easing is premature. Raab said we're transitioning from 4 to 3

PLEASE STOP LYING AND TREATING US ALL AS IDIOTS

BE HONEST AND TRANSPARENT 

PLEASE
